title: Everything you want to know about me - the designer & developer.
bio: I'm a software developer with strong skills in C#, Python, Java, and C/C++. My focus is on software development, and I have experience with web technologies like Django, Bootstrap, CSS, and HTML, as well as tools such as Unity, Git, and the .NET Framework.

I also have a solid background in data analysis with pandas and matplotlib, and database management using MySQL. My proficiency in API integration using Python and working with Linux further enhances my software development capabilities.

Currently pursuing studies in Computer Programming & Analysis at Seneca College. Previously, I studied Programming Engineering at Ural Federal University. At STEKLODOM LLC, I developed a g-code generation application for CNC machines.

My projects include building software solutions like websites with Django, automating game features, conducting data analysis, creating a Binance checker, automating server tasks on Linux, and developing a web parser.
I'm eager to contribute to software development projects, focusing on developing, modifying, debugging, and maintaining code.
